original_text: and be like men who are waiting for their master to come home from the wedding feast, so that they may open the door to him at once when he comes and knocks.
korean_text: 너희는 마치 그 주인이 혼인 집에서 돌아와 문을 두드리면 곧 열어 주려고 기다리는 사람과 같이 되라

sentences.original_text: who are waiting for their master
to come home from the wedding feast
so that they may open the door to him
at once when he comes and knocks
